text:
@GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump This is Rivera speculating, his un-corroborated claim about what happened. Here's the news: https://t.co/FGrYi2MLJd

Stop lying to us.

The more you lie about this the less we believe.

Jobless, hungry, fearing eviction, we watch COVID-19 infections grow while you coverup lies.
